commit.message:
invoke.texi (VMS Options): Merge Alpha/VMS and IA-64/VMS Options.

2012-03-12  Tristan Gingold  <gingold@adacore.com>

	* doc/invoke.texi (VMS Options): Merge Alpha/VMS and IA-64/VMS
	Options.  Mention -mpointer-size.

files.patch:
